room_title: Escape room "Hunter P.I." by Hint Hunter Puzzle Rooms in Biloxi
review: It was so much fun! We did the Hunter P.I room and solved the last puzzle with just about 2 mins to spare. What a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Hunter P.I." by Hint Hunter Puzzle Rooms in Biloxi
review: Took my 14-year-old and her friends for a birthday event. I was worried that they wouldn't be entertained - however, they all had a blast doing the P. I. room. They even made it out with mere seconds to spare! Mr. T. J. was a great host and very accommodating to the needs of the party. I can't wait to back and try the rest of the rooms with my family!
